H0.text: Which four letter word beginning with T is a small mountain lake. Teal

H1.text: Which four letter word beginning with T is a small mountain lake. Tank

H2.text: Which four letter word beginning with T is a small mountain lake. Taps

H3.text: Which four letter word beginning with T is a small mountain lake. Tarn

A4.text: A tarn (or corrie loch) is a mountain lake, pond or pool, formed in a cirque (or 'corrie') excavated by a glacier.

A5.text: The word is derived from the Old Norse word tj√∂rn ('a small mountain lake without tributaries') meaning pond.
